name: Samsung Galaxy A70
description: The Samsung Galaxy A70 is part of Samsung’s A-series (launched 2019), aiming at users wanting large display and battery, solid camera performance, and modern features without flagship pricing. It offers Snapdragon 675 processor, 6-8 GB RAM with 128 GB storage (expandable), a triple-rear camera setup (32 MP main, 8 MP ultra-wide, 5 MP depth), and a high-resolution 32 MP front camera. The phone also includes an under-display (optical) fingerprint sensor, “Infinity-U” notch display, and runs Android (originally 9 Pie) with Samsung’s One UI. Its build uses a plastic/glass composite (“Glasstic”) back, USB-C for charging, and retains the 3.5 mm headphone jack.
shortDescription: A large-screen, mid-range Samsung phone with a 6.7" Super AMOLED display, strong battery life (4,500 mAh), triple rear cameras, fast (25 W) charging, and substantial RAM & storage—designed for multime

specifications.storage: 128 GB internal; expandable via microSD UPTO 512GB
specifications.camera: Rear || Triple: 32 MP main (f/1.7), 8 MP ultra-wide, 5 MP depth sensor. Front || 32 MP (f/2.0)
specifications.operatingSystem: Launched with Android 9.0 “Pie” + One UI; updated in many regions to Android 11 with One UI 3.1
connectivity: SIM: Dual SIM standby; dual nano-SIM
specifications.material: Front: scratch-resistant glass (Gorilla Glass 3); back: plastic / “Glasstic” ; frame: plastic/glass composite

features: Large 6.7" Super AMOLED full-HD+ Infinity-U display
Triple rear cameras for wide, ultra-wide, and portrait (depth) shots
Big battery (4,500 mAh) with 25 W fast charging
One UI interface over Android, with software updates to Android 11 in many regions

name: Apple iPhone 12
description: The iPhone 12 (launched October 2020) brings together Apple’s powerful A14 Bionic chip, 5G connectivity, and a modern flat-edge design with glass front and back and aluminum frame. It features a 6.1-inch OLED HDR display (Super Retina XDR) protected by Ceramic Shield glass, dual 12MP rear cameras (wide + ultra-wide), and a 12MP front (TrueDepth) camera. It is water and dust resistant (IP68), supports wireless charging including MagSafe, and ships with iOS (originally 14) with updates up to recent versions. Multiple storage options (64, 128, 256 GB) and several color choices make it suitable for varied preferences.
shortDescription: Apple iPhone 12 with 6.1″ Super Retina XDR OLED, A14 Bionic chip, 5G support, dual 12MP cameras, MagSafe wireless charging, and Ceramic Shield durability.

specifications.processor: Apple A14 Bionic, 5 nm process, Hexa-core (2 performance + 4 efficiency cores)
specifications.camera: Rear || Dual: 12 MP wide (f/1.6, OIS) + 12 MP ultra-wide (f/2.4)  Front || 12 MP (f/2.2), TrueDepth camera system
specifications.operatingSystem: iOS 14 at launch; upgradable to recent iOS versions
connectivity: 5G (sub-6 GHz / some variants mmWave depending on region)
specifications.material: Glass front (Ceramic Shield), glass back, aluminum frame; IP68 rating

features: Super Retina XDR OLED display with HDR10 / Dolby Vision support
Ceramic Shield front glass (more drop resistant)
Dual 12MP rear camera setup (wide + ultra-wide) with Night mode, Deep Fusion, Smart HDR etc.
MagSafe wireless charging + standard Qi wireless charging
IP68 rating for water/dust resistance (up to 6m for 30 minutes)

name: Apple MagSafe Charger
description: The Apple MagSafe Charger is a wireless magnetic charging pad built for compatibility with iPhones and other Qi-enabled Apple accessories. It uses built-in magnets to align precisely with MagSafe-compatible iPhones for efficient charging. When paired with suitable power adapters, it delivers fast wireless charging—including up to 25W on newer iPhones with a 30W USB-C adapter. Comes with either a 1 m or 2 m cable, recognized for its braided design in newer versions, and certified for Qi2 and Qi standards. Ideal for desks, bedside tables, or portable use.
shortDescription: MagSafe Charger by Apple: magnetically aligns with compatible iPhones, delivers up to 25W wireless charging (with 30W adapter), certified Qi2 & Qi-wireless, 1m / 2m USB-C cable.

connectivity: Wireless power transfer (Magnetic wireless, Qi/ Qi2)
USB-C cable connects to power adapter (power input)
specifications.material: Circular charging puck; magnets; soft white charging surface; wrapped cable (braided in newer version)

features: Magnetic alignment for seamless MagSafe compatibility
Supports fast wireless charging up to 25W with appropriate adapter
Backward compatible with Qi wireless charging
Certified for Qi2 and Qi standards

name: Apple iPhone 7
description: The Apple iPhone 7 features a 4.7-inch Retina HD display, powered by the A10 Fusion chip. It offers a 12MP rear camera with optical image stabilization and a 7MP front camera. The device is water and dust resistant (IP67), supports stereo speakers, and comes in multiple storage options (32GB, 128GB, 256GB).
shortDescription: Compact smartphone with 4.7-inch Retina HD display, A10 Fusion chip, 12MP rear camera, 7MP front camera, and IP67 water/dust resistance.

connectivity: Wireless: Wi‑Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 4.2, GPS, NFC

features: 12MP rear camera with optical image stabilization

name: Apple iPhone 11
description: The Apple iPhone 11 features a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina HD display, powered by the A13 Bionic chip. It offers a dual 12MP rear camera system with Night mode and 4K video recording capabilities. The device includes Face ID for secure authentication and is water and dust resistant with an IP68 rating. Available in multiple colors and storage options.
shortDescription: 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display, A13 Bionic chip, dual 12MP rear cameras, 4K video recording, Face ID, and IP68 water resistance.
features: Dual 12MP rear cameras with Night mode
